resources.string:
Welcome to GreenIO, read here for the usage F.A.Q.

 

Prerequisites:

start the Room via the program create_room.py that you can download from https://github.com/FrancescoSegala/smart-env to launch the energy monitornig service in your environment, and get the connection Topic required later to bind it to your app.

 

Usage:

We will define function as one of the functions accessible from the homepage menu.

Once yo connected to the room in the prerequisites the app will show you the energy statistics. So you can log in and create an Environment in the create Env section. Then you use the Topic given from the create_room.py and connect to the room.

After that you have connected the two parts and now all works by itself. You can change and update the Profile as you wish in the change Profile part. The Profile is checked periodically by the server so you can tune the daily profile behavior with your best fit.

For each condition Air,Temp,Light you can decide wheter adopt a saving profile policy or not independently one another, while you set your profile.

Finally you can delete your environmets in the delete Env section, stopping the execution of the stream by deleting it.
